mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NT_CNT = NT_CNT+1 WHERE NTNO = #{no} AND NT_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_STATUS ='N' AND NTNO = #{ntno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NTNO, EMP_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_ACCESS , NT_FILE_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NTNO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{ntTitle}, #{ntContent}, #{ntAccess}, #{ntFileName})
INSERT INTO NOTICE_ATTACHMENTS (NTAT_NO, NTAT_CHANGE, NTAT_ORIGIN, NTAT_PATH, NTNO) VALUES (SEQ_NTATTACHMENTS_NTATNO, #{ntatChange}, #{ntatOrigin}, #{ntatPath}, SEQ_NOTICE_NTNO.CURRVAL)
